data: So quiet is the small market town of Upton, that it is difficult to believe in the stir and din of London, which is little more than an hourâ€™s journey from it.
So quiet is the small market town of Upton, that it is difficult to believe in the stir and din of London, which is little more than an hour's journey from it.
